where are the gnome appearance settings: where are the gnome appearance settings saved for an individual user? (e.g. the transparency of their panels, their background image, etc.)
in what file are the gnome appearance settings saved for an individual user? (e.g. the transparency of their panels, their background image, etc.)
in gconf (which is either accessed by using "gconf-editor" or manually editing the xml files in ~/.gconf then restarting gconf)
